Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can create a drawing that shows two students using a string telephone to communicate.
The student can illustrate the string connecting the two devices between the students.
The student can include an explanation in the drawing of how the string helps transmit sound from one student to the other.
The student can label parts of the drawing to show how the design uses sound to communicate information.
The student can demonstrate through the drawing how the device helps solve the problem of communicating over a distance.
